definition[0]: to build towers, walls etc around an area or city in order to defend it
definition[1]: to encourage an attitude or feeling and make it stronger
example[1]: Her position was fortified by election successes and economic recovery.
definition[2]: to make someone feel physically or mentally stronger
example[2]: We fortified ourselves with a breakfast of bacon and eggs.
definition[3]: to make food or drinks more healthy by adding vitamins to them
explanation[0]: Fortify is usually passive in this meaning
